name: Puzzle Aquarium
description:
Welcome to Puzzle Aquarium!
Is this your first time here? Experience an aquarium like never before!
Solve puzzles with cute fish and decorate an aquarium of your own!

Decorate an aquarium for your adorable fish while playing 12 kinds of puzzles. Feed, play, and watch new fish families form. Come on in, have fun in the aquarium with your cute fish friends!

Puzzle Aquarium features
• You can make your own unique aquarium using various fish and decor while solving puzzles!
• 12 various puzzles are waiting for you!
• Play with cute fish families!
• Free to play!
• Can be played offline!

NOTES
• Puzzle Aquarium is a free to play puzzle game.
• Puzzle Aquarium supports mobile phones and tablets.
• Puzzle Aquarium contains advertisements (banner, full screen, and video ads).
• Puzzle Aquarium contains in-app purchases.

SUPPORT
Experiencing a problem or have a suggestion? We would love to hear from you! You can reach us at pivotgameshelp@gmail.com

Play Puzzle Aquarium now!
